ai-tika-vin09t11:2_0: ‘This is the third way of stealing ...
ai-tika-vin09t11:3_0: if he is unable to get something else, then it may be unable to find anyone else to receive it, one that has been relinquished; it has been relinquished;
ai-tika-vin09t11:4_0: The section on relinquishment and confession is finished.
